channel.title: Wasteland RSPS - Looking for a development team!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2817eau.png[/img][/center]
[center]It's been a while since I haven't touched RSPS so i've decided to start a brand new RSPS. My previous server was successful and I would like this to be the same, I'm looking for a development team which can help me bring this RSPS to the max level! I'm a good developer but still i'm not a perfect one. I'm making this RSPS for educational purposes because making RSPS for money wouldn't get your server anywhere. I will be paying the development team once the server is making progress and making donations. So let's get started![/center]
[center][size=18pt][b][u]Goals[/u][/b][/size][/center] [center]- My first goal is to make the server very stable so it can hold a lot of players without buying or having a very expensive hardware such as VPS or Dedicated server. - My second goal is to make the server 100% dupe free so there will be no economy resets, rollbacks & etc. This will make a very good economy. - My third goal is to fix all bugs/glitches we can find on the server so the game will be flawless. - My fourth goal is to add atleast 5 bosses & 5 minigames in order for players to enjoy the game. - My fifth goal is to add a fair amount of training locations in order for players to train and level up easily. - My sixth goal is to establish a good & friendly community in order for players to interact or communicate with others easily and freely. - My seventh goal is to have a good staff & development team. - My eight goal is to make this server successful. - My ninth goal is to add more unique/cool features & extra benefits for players to enjoy the game. - My tenth goal is to make the server 100% free to play, you don't need to pay for items, ranks & etc.[/center]
[center][size=18pt][b][u]Positions[/u][/b][/size][/center]
[ul][li][b]Server Developer[/b][/li] [list] [li]Must at least know the basics of Java[/li] [li]Must at least can develop contents from scratch[/li] [li]Must at least know how to fix compiler errors, bugs, dupes, glitches, memleaks & etc[/li] [li]Must at least know 317 PI[/li] [/list]
[li][b]Client Developer[/b][/li] [list] [li]Must at least know the basics of Java[/li] [li]Must at least can make their own interfaces and implement them to the server[/li] [li]Must at least know how to fix compiler errors and startup errors & etc[/li] [li]Must at least know how to pack datas[/li] [/list]
[li][b]GFX Artist[/b][/li] [list] [li]Must at least know how to use Adobe Photoshop[/li] [li]Must at least can make their own graphics[/li] [li]Must at least know how to improve images[/li] [li]Must at least have a knowledge in media editing[/li] [/list]
[center][size=18pt][b][u]Application Format[/u][/b][/size][/center][/ul] [code]Position you are applying for: Age: Previous work/projects: Do you understand of not getting paid until the server is making progress & donations?: How dedicated you will be?: Do you know how to use dropbox?: Skype:[/code]

item.title: Wasteland RSPS - Looking for a development team!
item.dc:creator: @mr_pker01 mr pker01
item.description:
@mr_pker01 wrote:

[quote=“haviland4, post:10, topic:527799”][center][b]
Server Developer
Must at least know the basics of Java
Must at least can develop contents from scratch
Must at least know how to fix compiler errors, bugs, dupes, glitches, memleaks & etc
Must at least know 317 PI

Position you are applying for:Server Developer
Age:17
Previous work/projects:Rune-X-Scape
Do you understand of not getting paid until the server is making progress & donations?:Yes
How dedicated you will be?:100%
Do you know how to use dropbox?:Yes
Skype:haviland41
Name:Josh

Note:Been learning ICT & Game Design for 2 Years now in colleage.
Happy to help and earn some spare cash on the side.[/b][/center][/quote]

Added on Skype.

Read full topic

item.title: Wasteland RSPS - Looking for a development team!
item.dc:creator: @mr_pker01 mr pker01
item.description:
@mr_pker01 wrote:

[center][/center]

[center]It’s been a while since I haven’t touched RSPS so i’ve decided to start a brand new RSPS. My previous server was successful and I would like this to be the same, I’m looking for a development team which can help me bring this RSPS to the max level! I’m a good developer but still i’m not a perfect one. I’m making this RSPS for educational purposes because making RSPS for money wouldn’t get your server anywhere. I will be paying the development team once the server is making progress and making donations. So let’s get started![/center]

[center][size=18pt]Goals[/size][/center]
[center]- My first goal is to make the server very stable so it can hold a lot of players without buying or having a very expensive hardware such as VPS or Dedicated server.

  • My second goal is to make the server 100% dupe free so there will be no economy resets, rollbacks & etc. This will make a very good economy.
  • My third goal is to fix all bugs/glitches we can find on the server so the game will be flawless.
  • My fourth goal is to add atleast 5 bosses & 5 minigames in order for players to enjoy the game.
  • My fifth goal is to add a fair amount of training locations in order for players to train and level up easily.
  • My sixth goal is to establish a good & friendly community in order for players to interact or communicate with others easily and freely.
  • My seventh goal is to have a good staff & development team.
  • My eight goal is to make this server successful.
  • My ninth goal is to add more unique/cool features & extra benefits for players to enjoy the game.
  • My tenth goal is to make the server 100% free to play, you don’t need to pay for items, ranks & etc.[/center]

[center][size=18pt]Positions[/size][/center]

[ul][li]Server Developer[/li]
[list]
[li]Must at least know the basics of Java[/li]
[li]Must at least can develop contents from scratch[/li]
[li]Must at least know how to fix compiler errors, bugs, dupes, glitches, memleaks & etc[/li]
[li]Must at least know 317 PI[/li]
[/list]

[li]Client Developer[/li]
[list]
[li]Must at least know the basics of Java[/li]
[li]Must at least can make their own interfaces and implement them to the server[/li]
[li]Must at least know how to fix compiler errors and startup errors & etc[/li]
[li]Must at least know how to pack datas[/li]
[/list]

[li]GFX Artist[/li]
[list]
[li]Must at least know how to use Adobe Photoshop[/li]
[li]Must at least can make their own graphics[/li]
[li]Must at least know how to improve images[/li]
[li]Must at least have a knowledge in media editing[/li]
[/list]

[center][size=18pt]Application Format[/size][/center][/ul]

Position you are applying for: Age: Previous work/projects: Do you understand of not getting paid until the server is making progress & donations?: How dedicated you will be?: Do you know how to use dropbox?: Skype:
